column5: Hey Folks,  Dont mean to be a rude but I have to tell you. I am in the east coast on business for two weeks and seeing as I have a weekend in there with nothin to do I figure I would give it a shot and see if I could get out with a guide. Sure enough I have a horseshoe in the right place and I managed to get a ride with Country Haven lodge. I was talking to the head guide today, he said the season opened last weekend and they have had days with 70-120 fish so far. Ohhhhh Man I am excited for Atlantic Salmon. I will take as many pics as I can and post em  Cheers  Gnoddy
Sounds awesome.  I'm anxious for the report already.  Good luck
Can't wait to see the pics. I'm from New Brunswick and have never fished the Miramichi. It's a great river from what I hear. Good luck 2 ya!
